{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WMR-300 |upc=747464127101 |asin=B00DJ6AFX4 |fcc_date=04/19/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WRTR-299GN |type=travel router |fcc_id=FDI000000012 |ic_id=6102A-048 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=USB Male A |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620N |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EM2I-12G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162GFR-S6C |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, (57600,8,N,1) |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2A, 23V, 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8294;;1;,,, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink UBoot;Version:4.1.1.0;, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Buffalo-G-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Buffalo-G-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=B0:C7:45 |oui_eth=B0:C7:45 }} [http://buffalo.jp/product/wireless-lan/ap/wmr-300/ Product page (JP)]
"S07-8901R RoHS" and "WRTR-299GN_V01" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Default settings are per the FCC sample label.
{{OpenWrtTechData|https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/buffalo/buffalo_wmr-300}}, {{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/wmr-300}}
